hr.auth.authorize.invalid.body_html:
Vaš autorizacijski kod nije valjan.

Molimo vas da kopirate i zalijepite cijelu URL adresu koji smo vam poslali putem e-maila.
hr.auth.authorize.invalid.heading: Nevaljano ovlaštenje
hr.auth.authorize.success_growl: Sad Vas preusmjeravamo na Game Jolt nadzornu ploču.
hr.auth.forgot_link: Zaboravio sam korisničko ime ili lozinku
hr.auth.forgot.email_help: Upišite e-mail adresu sa Vašeg računa i poslat čemo vam vaše informacije za prijavu.
hr.auth.forgot.heading: Povrat informacija za prijavu
hr.auth.forgot.invalid_email_error_html: Hmm, ta e-mail adresa nije u našem sistemu. Pokušajte ponovo. A možda se samo još niste prijavili?
hr.auth.forgot.sent.body_html: Poslali smo vaše informacije za prijavu na vašu e-mail adresu. Želimo vam dobar dan!
hr.auth.forgot.sent.heading: Vaše informacije su poslane
hr.auth.forgot.sent.spam: Ako ne pronađete naš e-mail u slijedećih 10 minuta, molimo vas da provjerite vaš 'spam folder'. Možda ga je progutao!
hr.auth.join.almost.body_html:
Prije nego što se prijavite u Game Jolt, moramo provjeriti vašu e-mail adresu koju ste nam dali. Nadamo se da niste koristili tuđu adresu!

Poslali smo vam e-mail sa uputama kako da ovlastite svoj račun.
hr.auth.join.almost.heading: Skoro smo gotovi!
hr.auth.join.almost.spam: Ako ne pronađete naš e-mail u slijedećih 10 minuta, molimo vas da provjerite vaš 'spam folder'. Možda je progutan!
hr.auth.join.almost.urgency: Nemojte zaboraviti da imate tjedan dana da ovlastite vaš račun, Nakon isteka roka e-mail će biti izbrisan... E, onda sve ponovno!
hr.auth.linked_account.twitter.finalize.dup:
Ta e-mail adresa se već koristi.

Ako već imate račun Game Jolta možete se ulogirati ovdje.

Ako ste slučajno zaboravili vaše podatke, možete ih ovdje povratiti.
hr.auth.linked_account.twitter.finalize.ema: Da bi završili sa prijavom preko Twittera, unesite valjanu e-mail adresu.
hr.auth.reset_password.heading: Nova lozinka
hr.auth.reset_password.password_help: Ako želite resetirati svoju lozinku, unesite novu dolje.
hr.auth.join.join_message_html:
Pridružite nam se muahahaha!
Mi imamo igre!
Muahahaha!
hr.auth.join.page_title: Pridružite se Game Joltu - Najvećoj kolekciji indie igara od ljudi
hr.auth.linked_account.facebook.created_gro: Vaš račun je izrađen. Odavde je sve laganini!
hr.auth.linked_account.facebook.duplicate_e:
E-mail adresa povezana s ovim Facebook računom je već u uporabi.
Možda već imate račun?
hr.auth.linked_account.facebook.no_email_gr: Vaš Facebook račun nije prikazao Vašu e-mail adresu. Budite sigurni da ste ju ovjerili preko Facebooka.
hr.auth.linked_account.twitter.created_grow: Vaš račun je izrađen. Odavde je sve laganini!
hr.auth.reset_password.success_growl: Vaša lozinka je resetirana. Sada se možete prijaviti s novom.
hr.chat.no_friends_message_html: Dodajte prijatelje na sajtu kako bi ste se dopisivali s njima, vidjeli što igraju i igrali igre s njima!
hr.dash.avatar.body_html:
Mi upravo koristimo Gravatar (Globally Recognized Avatars) kao uslugu koja nudi avatare za Game Jolt.

Ako nemate Gravatar račun, možete kliknuti na gumb ispod kako biste otvorili gravatar.com i ondje se registrirali. Morate znati da za prijavu trebate imati WordPress račun.Što? Nemate ni WordPress račun? Bez brige! Možete napraviti oba računa u isto vrijeme.

Imate Gravatar account? Odlično. Samo se prijavite i uploadajte avatar po Vašem izboru, a zatim ga povežite s e-mail adresom koju koristite za Game Jolt. Vaš avatar će se automatski pojaviti na sajtu.

Imajte na umu da će možda proći neko vrijeme dok se avatar pojavi. Ako ga ne budete vidjeli nakon stvarno dugo vremena, pokušajte očistiti cache Vašeg web-preglednika.
hr.dash.avatar.heading: Nabava avatara
hr.dash.change_pass.heading: Promjeni lozinku računa
hr.dash.change_pass.invalid_old_password_er: Lozinka koju ste unijeli je netočna.
hr.dash.change_pass.no_match_error: Lozinke koje ste unijeli nisu iste. Pokušajte ih ponovo utipkati.
hr.dash.email_prefs.heading: Postavke vašeg e-maila
hr.dash.email_prefs.notifications_descripti: Recite nam kakve vrste e-mail obavijesti želite dobivati uključivanjem/isključivanjem kategorija.
hr.dash.forms.image_filetype_help_html:
Vaša slika mora biti u PNG, JPG ili GIF formatu.
PNG format je preporučljiv jer slika ne gubi na kvaliteti.
hr.dash.forms.thumbnail_filetype_help_html:
Vaša minijaturna slika mora biti u PNG, JPG ili GIF formatu.
Animirani GIF-ovi daju gamerima dašak Vaše igre u akciji.
Za slike preporučamo PNG format jer slika ne gubi na kvaliteti.
hr.dash.funds.withdraw.email_help: Ovo mora biti valjana e-mail adresa povezana s Vašim PayPal računom.
hr.dash.funds.withdraw.form_help_html: Budite sigurni da su informacije koje unosite dolje točne. Podatke nećete moći izmijeniti nakon što potvrdite.
hr.dash.funds.withdraw.heading: Povlačenje prihoda
hr.dash.funds.withdraw.page_help_html:
Molimo pričekajte 3 dana za procesuiranje povrata. Trenutno se svi povrati procesuirao preko PayPala.

Ako nemate PayPal račun, nećete biti u mogućnosti povući novac. Molimo Vas da se prijavite na PayPal račun prije nego što pokušate zatražiti povrat novca.
hr.dash.games.add.fnaf_autotag_message_html: ␣Čini se da je Vaša igra fan verzija, spinoff ili neslužbeni nastavak serijala Five Nights at Freddy's. Zato smo u opis Vaše igre dodali hashtag #fnaf. Ovaj hashtag je obvezan za sve igre koje proizlaze iz serijala Five Night at Freddy's.
hr.dash.games.add.heading: Dodaj igru
hr.dash.games.api.overview.heading: Pregled API igre
hr.dash.games.api.overview.page_help_html:
␣

API igre dopuštava Vam da začinite Vašuigru s tablicom bodova, trofejima, pohranom podataka u oblaku, sesijskom prijavom i još puno toga.

Možete otići na poveznice ispod ako želite vidjeti je li zajednica već napisala API library ili plugin za engine/alat/jezik koji Vi koristite. Naravno, uvijek možete i Vi napisati jedan i podijeliti ga na forumima!
hr.dash.games.api.overview.scores_tooltip: Ukupan broj bodova ostvarenih kroz igru, uključujući i rezultate gostiju.
hr.dash.games.api.overview.scores_users_too: Broj korisnika s bodovima na svakoj bodovnoj listi igre. Ne uključuje goste.
hr.dash.games.api.overview.sessions_help: Sesije pokazuju tko igra i koliko dugo igra.
hr.dash.games.api.overview.trophies_exp_too: Ukupno nagrađivan XP za trofeje u Vašim igrama.
hr.dash.games.api.settings.heading: Postavke API-ja
hr.dash.games.api.settings.page_alert_html:
Nikad nemojte davati svoj privatni ključ ikome!
Ključ tvoje igre se koristi da potvrdi API zahtjeve koje dolazi sa tvoje igrice. Ako neprijatelji ili podlaci ga uzmu, mogu poslati lažne zahtjeve pretvarati se da je to tvoja igrica. Nije dobro!
hr.dash.games.builds.form.dimensions_help_h: Ovo su dimenzije na kojem će biti prikazane vaš brovser build biti displejovan.
hr.dash.games.builds.form.disable_right_cli: Ovo Vam omogućuje da koristite desni klik. Koristite ovo samo ako vaša igra treba izbjeći desni klik.
hr.dash.games.builds.form.no_platforms_erro: Trebate odabrati barem jednu platformu na kojoj vasa igra radi (ili "Ostalo").
hr.dash.games.builds.form.platforms_help_ht: Odaberite "Ostalo" ako Vaša igra radi na platformi koja nije ovdje navedena, ili ako nije ".exe" fajl ne go npr. ".pdf".
hr.dash.games.data_store.items.heading: Stavke pohrane podataka
hr.dash.games.data_store.items.page_help_ht: Možete koristiti API da bi čuvao podatke... u oblaku! Svi sačuvani podatci bit će spremljeni ovdje.
hr.dash.games.data_store.items.view.heading: Detalji stavke
hr.dash.games.form.engine_other_why_tooltip: This helps us create better filtering options around which tools people use.
hr.dash.games.header.page_help_link: What are the header requirements and guidelines?
hr.dash.games.hidden_message: Ova igre je trenutno skrivena od javnosti.
hr.dash.games.hidden_message_unpublished: We recommend keeping it hidden until you've finished filling out the details and added some media. Don't forget to unhide it when it's ready, or it won't show up in the game listings!
hr.dash.games.maturity.page_help_html: Every game on Game Jolt, even works-in-progress, needs a maturity rating to describe its content. Accurate ratings and details about content help gamers make informed decisions. Remember, you can always come back later and make changes.
hr.dash.games.maturity.wip_help: If you don't know what the final content of your game will be, give an educated guess. You can make changes later.
hr.dash.games.media.add.image.page_help_htm: Add screenshots, concept drawings, photos of little clay models, fake box covers, or any other original art created for the game. Yes, even if it's a text-based game!
hr.dash.games.media.add.video.page_help_htm:
Add videos you've created, such as trailers, gameplay footage, walkthroughs, etc.

Please don't add Let's Plays or reviews. Let the content owners do that themselves in the comments.
hr.dash.games.media.image.form.caption_help: Ovaj natpis će pisati kada u prikazu Vaše slike preko cijelog zaslona.
hr.dash.games.media.page_help_html: Want people to play your game? Add some images and video to your page. We recommend adding as many images and videos as you can--even if your game is all text!
hr.dash.games.media.video.form.url_help_htm:
We currently only support videos from Vimeo or YouTube.
The URL should look something like:
YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oHg5SJYRHA0
Vimeo: http://www.vimeo.com/2619976
hr.dash.games.music.no_music_html: You haven't added any music. Upload some songs from your game! The music player's worth it, trust us!
hr.dash.games.music.page_help_html: Let people enjoy your game's soundtrack whenever they want! Upload MP3s of music from your game and the songs will appear on your game page in a nice little music player. Don't upload copyrighted songs without permission!
hr.dash.games.overview.publish_confirmation: Publishing your game makes it visible on the site, so make sure your game page is lookin' good!
hr.dash.games.overview.todo_info_builds_pro: You still have builds that are being processed. They won't show on your game page until they're finished processing.
hr.dash.games.packages.form.description_hel: This should be filled in only if it's needed, if the name alone isn't enough to distinguish this package from other packages.
hr.dash.games.packages.form.title_help_html: This is the name that shows up on your game page above the Download/Play button. For your main package, use the title of your game.
hr.dash.games.packages.manage.releases.head: Releases
hr.dash.games.packages.manage.releases.hidd: This release is hidden and won't show up on your game page until published.
hr.dash.games.packages.manage.releases.page: Releases represent new versions of your package. If you update a package, you should add a release. You can group all of the new builds for different platforms into a single new release.
hr.dash.games.packages.manage.releases.publ: This release is published and can be accessed from your game page.
hr.dash.games.packages.page_help_html:
Packages are how you organize and distribute your game's builds and other files.

Your primary package should contain the builds you want people to play. You can create new packages to contain additional files, such as level editors, art packs, expansions, and other DLC.
hr.dash.games.releases.builds.launch_option: Oh no! We didn't find any executable files for this platform in the archive.

We've detected that this build is a standalone executable file.

It can be launched automatically.
hr.dash.games.releases.builds.processing_me: Processing build. It will become available in this release as soon as we're done.
hr.dash.games.releases.form.version_number_:
Version numbers are how you label releases.
Numbering should follow the format MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH.
Learn more about choosing a good version number...
hr.dash.games.scoreboard.form.asc_help: Scores with lower values are ranked better.
hr.dash.games.scoreboard.form.desc_help: Scores with higher values are ranked better.
hr.dash.games.scoreboard.form.unique_help: Only show a user's best score?
hr.dash.games.scoreboards.heading: Scoreboards
hr.dash.games.scoreboards.page_help_html:
The API allows you to add multiple customized scoreboards, with control over sorting options and guest scoring, and the ability to attach extra hidden data to scores.

The primary scoreboard is the one that will show by default on your game's page. Set a new primary by dragging a scoreboard into the first slot.
hr.dash.games.scores.list.heading: View Scores
hr.dash.games.scores.list.page_help_html: These are all of the scores that have been submitted to this scoreboard by users and guests (if allowed).
hr.dash.games.scores.user.list.heading: View Scores
hr.dash.games.scores.user.list.no_scores_ht: The user has no scores on this scoreboard.
hr.dash.games.scores.view.data_none_help: No extra data for this score. You can use the extra data field to store information to help you weed out cheaters and validate scores. It's never shown to users.
hr.dash.games.scores.view.heading: Score Details
hr.dash.games.settings.ads_help_html:
Turning this off will remove all ads for this game.

Only do this if you don't want to monetize your game, or if your game is subject to a license that doesn't allow monetization.
hr.dash.games.settings.comments_help_html:
Turning this off will disable comments for this game and hide any comments already on the page.

The community will no longer be able to give you feedback via comments, but you may prefer this if your game contains sensitive or controversial material.

This will never remove comments from your game page—merely hide them. If you allow comments again in the future, all previously hidden comments will be restored.
hr.dash.games.settings.ga_tracking_id_help_:
Use Google Analytics to track a multitude of stats and get tons of information about your game page. Just enter your Google Analytics tracking ID here and we'll start sending data over there right away.

Here's how to set get started:

  • Create (or log into an existing) Google Analytics account.
  • Set up a new Property (go to the Admin tab and select Create new property from the dropdown menu under Property).
  • Select Website and enter gamejolt.com as the URL.
  • Select an Industry Category and a Reporting Time Zone.
  • Click Get Tracking ID.
  • Come back here and enter your Tracking ID.
  • You're all set!
hr.dash.games.settings.ratings_help_html:
Turning this off will disable ratings for this game and hide any ratings already on the page.

Your game's voltage will be calculated as if it had received no ratings. If you allow ratings in the future, the old ratings will be reapplied and your voltage will be recalculated.
hr.dash.games.thumbnail.page_help_html:
A thumbnail is the little rectangular image that represents your game throughout the site. People can click it in game listings and search results to get to your game page.

Please don't choose an image that contains nudity, swear words, or adult-oriented imagery.
hr.dash.games.thumbnail.page_help_link: What are the thumbnail requirements and guidelines?
hr.dash.games.trophies.form.hidden_help: Hidden trophies are invisible to everyone but the game's developer, for testing and other nefarious reasons.
hr.dash.games.trophies.form.secret_help: Secret trophies hide everything but their titles from players until they are achieved.
hr.dash.games.trophies.has_hidden_html: You have hidden trophies! Be sure to unhide them when you're ready for players to achieve them.
hr.dash.games.trophies.heading: Game Trophies
hr.dash.games.trophies.page_help_html: The API lets you add multiple unique trophies, each forged from a material that indicates how difficult it is to achieve: bronze (easiest), silver, gold, or platinum (hardest).
hr.dash.integrate.exp_help_body_html:
To earn experience and level up, be sure to rate and comment on the games you play.

However, the fastest way to gather EXP is to achieve trophies and get onto scoreboards!
hr.dash.integrate.heading: Integrate
hr.dash.integrate.lead: Here's a to-do list of things to get you started with the site:
hr.dash.overview.heading: Your Dashboard
hr.dash.overview.revenue_tooltip: Game Jolt gives you a percentage of the ad revenue we make from your games on the site.
hr.dash.profile.edit.display_name_help: If you enter a display name, it'll show up on the site instead of your username. Unlike usernames, display names can contain spaces and special characters.
hr.dash.profile.edit.display_name_time_left:
You can only change your display name once a week.
You have {{ duration }} left until you can change your display name again.
hr.dash.profile.edit.heading: Edit Your Information
hr.dash.profile.edit.username_time_left_htm:
You can only change your username once a week.
You have {{ duration }} left until you can change it again.

hr.discover.home.fireside_help: Indie game news, reviews, and opinions by people.
hr.discover.home.hot_help: Popular indie games, sorted by Hotness.
hr.game.download.game.downloading_wait_mess: Your download should begin in just a moment...
hr.game.download.game.rate_html: What did you think? Game ratings allow us to show you better stuff. Help curate the site!
hr.game.download.soundtrack.downloading_wai: Your download should begin in just a moment...
hr.game.rating_growl.message: Game ratings allow us to show you better stuff. Help curate the site!

hr.game.scores.no_scores_html: There are no scores on this scoreboard yet.
hr.game.scores.no_user_scores_html: You don't have any scores here yet!
hr.game.trophies.heading: Trophies
hr.game.trophies.no_trophies_html: There are no trophies for this game yet. Bug the developer about adding some!
hr.games.list.date_descriptive_html: Games that were published on {{ date }}, sorted by Voltage, with the best scores at the top.
hr.games.list.date_range_descriptive_html: Games that were published between {{ dateStart }} and {{ dateEnd }}, sorted by Voltage, with the best scores at the top.
hr.games.list.featured_descriptive_html: Indie {{ category }} that we've featured on the homepage, sorted by feature date.
hr.games.list.freshness_tooltip: Freshness indicates community interest in recent games. A game's freshness score starts high and decays over time. Community activity can slow the decay.
hr.games.list.hotness_tooltip: Hotness indicates community interest in recent games. A game's Hotness score starts high and decays over time. Community activity can slow the decay.
hr.games.list.new_descriptive_html: Indie {{ category }} sorted by publication date.
hr.games.list.new_games_warning_html: Newly added games are not moderated, curated, or vetted by the community. You can find a goldmine of undiscovered talent or you may see some of the scariest shit of your life.
hr.games.list.voltage_tooltip: Voltage is our weighted rating system. All games start with an average score and the community drags it up or down.
hr.library.collection.developer_descriptive: These are the games made by {{ user }}.
hr.library.collection.developer_owner_descr:
These are the games that you've made. Be proud!
Feel free to share this page with others to show off your games.
hr.library.collection.followed_descriptive_: These are the games that {{ user }} is following.
hr.library.collection.followed_owner_descri:
When you follow a game, it shows up here.
You'll receive notifications when developers post news about any games you're following.
hr.library.collection.no_games_bundle_html: There are no games in this bundle yet.
hr.library.collection.no_games_developer_ht: This developer hasn't added any games yet.
hr.library.collection.no_games_followed_htm: No games are being followed yet.
hr.library.collection.no_games_playlist_htm: There are no games in this playlist yet, alas.
hr.library.collection.no_games_tag_html: There are no games with this tag yet.
hr.library.description_html: This is your personalized library of games. Here dwell the games you've followed and any playlists or bundles that you've made or followed.
hr.library.heading: Game Library
hr.library.nav.no_playlists_html:
Create playlists to organize and share the games in your library.

Follow other people's playlists to discover more games!
hr.library.playlists.developer_description: Here are the games created by this developer.
hr.library.playlists.followed_description: Here are the games this person is following.
hr.notifications.rating_details_html: And the value of the rating thou shalt receive is {{ rating }}. No more, no less.
hr.profile.no_bio_html: This person doesn't have a bio yet, so use your imagination!
hr.profile.no_developer_games_html: This developer hasn't published any games yet. Tell them to get a move on!

hr.dash.games.maturity.alcohol_1_descriptio: References to or images of alcoholic beverages.
hr.dash.games.maturity.bloodshed_3_descript: Depictions of bloodshed and the mutilation of body parts.
hr.dash.games.maturity.cartoon_violence_1_d: Depictions of cartoon-like characters in unsafe situations.
hr.dash.games.maturity.cartoon_violence_2_d: Depictions of cartoon-like characters in aggressive conflict.
hr.dash.games.maturity.cartoon_violence_3_d: Graphic depictions of violence involving cartoon-like characters.
hr.dash.games.maturity.drugs_1_description: References to or images of illicit drugs.
hr.dash.games.maturity.fantasy_violence_1_d: Depictions of characters in unsafe situations easily distinguishable from real life.
hr.dash.games.maturity.fantasy_violence_2_d: Depictions of characters in aggressive conflict easily distinguishable from real life.
hr.dash.games.maturity.fantasy_violence_3_d: Graphic depictions of violence involving situations easily distinguishable from real life.
hr.dash.games.maturity.gambling_2_descripti: Players can gamble using real money.
hr.dash.games.maturity.humor_1_description: Depictions of or dialog including slapstick humor.
hr.dash.games.maturity.humor_2_description: Depictions of or dialog including vulgar humor; bathroom humor.
hr.dash.games.maturity.humor_3_description: Depictions of or dialog including mature humor; sexual humor.
hr.dash.games.maturity.language_1_descripti: Mild or infrequent use of profanity.
hr.dash.games.maturity.language_3_descripti: Strong or frequent use of profanity.
hr.dash.games.maturity.nudity_1_description: Brief depictions of nudity or artistic nudity.
hr.dash.games.maturity.realistic_violence_1: Mild depictions of realistic characters in unsafe situations.
hr.dash.games.maturity.realistic_violence_2: Depictions of realistic characters in aggressive conflict.
hr.dash.games.maturity.realistic_violence_3: Graphic depictions of violence involving realistic characters.
hr.dash.games.maturity.sexual_themes_1_desc: Provocative references or depictions of provocative behavior.
hr.dash.games.maturity.sexual_themes_2_desc: Sexual references or depictions of sexual behavior.
hr.dash.games.maturity.sexual_violence_desc: Depictions of or graphic references to rape or other violent sexual behavior.
hr.dash.games.maturity.tobacco_1_descriptio: References to or images of tobacco products.

hr.dash.email_prefs.notify_comment_replies_: Get emails about replies in comment threads you're watching or to which you've replied.

hr.system_report.form.description_help: Describe what this system report is about, any bugs you may have encountered, and how you can reproduce.
hr.system_report.send.heading: Send System Report
hr.system_report.send.help: This will send a system report to us with details about your device and client log. We don't collect personal information through this.
hr.system_report.send.issue_tracker: If you experienced a bug, please report it first on our issue tracker.
hr.system_report.sent_growl: Your system report has been sent.
hr.library.installed.change_location_messag: You can change the location where games are installed at any time in your Settings.
hr.library.installed.heading: Installed Games
hr.library.installed.no_games_message: Your installed games show up here... that is, once you have some!
hr.External link to play the game (not uplo: External link to play the game (not uploaded on site)
hr.Game does not belong to this developer: Game does not belong to this developer
hr.Incorrect maturity rating for the conten: Incorrect maturity rating for the content in the game
hr.It contains spoilers and doesn't use spo: It contains spoilers and doesn't use spoiler tags (>!)
hr.It is hate speech or contains graphic co: It is hate speech or contains graphic content
hr.It is pornographic or contains sexually: It is pornographic or contains sexually explicit material
hr.It is spam or unwanted commercial conten: It is spam or unwanted commercial content
hr.No information on game page (no screensh: No information on game page (no screenshots, sparse description, placeholder page, etc.)
hr.Profile or username contains explicit or: Profile or username contains explicit or sensitive material
hr.Thanks for helping us make Game Jolt a p: Thanks for helping us make Game Jolt a place for everyone. We will take a look as soon as possible!
hr.dash.email_prefs.newsletter_help: Would you like to receive an email newsletter that contains updates and announcements of things like new site features, official contests, and interesting games?
hr.footer.client_promo.message: Play games faster with the Game Jolt Client!
hr.<strong>Be sure to remove or block ads f: Be sure to remove or block ads from showing in your browser games. We serve our own ads and share the revenue with developers. Domain names to block: gamejolt.com, *.gamejolt.com, gamejolt.net, *.gamejolt.net
hr.<strong>Java Applets have been deprecate: Java Applets have been deprecated. You can no longer edit your Java Applet builds, although gamers will still be able to play them if their browsers support them. You can add .jar files as downloadables and the Game Jolt Client will correctly launch them for users instead.
hr.<strong>Most browsers have stopped suppo: Most browsers have stopped supporting the Unity Web Player. Please consider exporting to WebGL instead.
hr.<strong>Silverlight builds have been dep: Silverlight builds have been deprecated. You can no longer edit your Silverlight builds, although gamers will still be able to play them if their browsers support them.
hr.<strong>The launch options you entered a: The launch options you entered are invalid. Make sure each selected file is in your build and that it works on the appropriate operating system.
hr.<strong>Your game is part of a jam that: Your game is part of a jam that locks builds during voting. You will not be able to add new builds until the voting period ends.
hr.Could not set the platform for some reas: Could not set the platform for some reason.
hr.For HTML builds, upload a .zip archive c: For HTML builds, upload a .zip archive containing all of your build's files and assets. There must be an {{ filename }} file in the root folder.
hr.This build doesn't seem to be a Windows,: This build doesn't seem to be a Windows, Mac or Linux build, so we've marked it as "Other" for you.
hr.This build has more info to fill in befo: This build has more info to fill in before it will be available in this release.
hr.This build is not launchable on certain: This build is not launchable on certain platforms. They've been disabled below.
hr.This package has builds that are still p: This package has builds that are still processing. They will become available in the package as soon as they're finished processing.
hr.You don't have any builds in this releas: You don't have any builds in this release yet. You won't be able to publish until you put some in.
hr.Check your internet connection and try a: Check your Internet connection and try again.
hr.Oh no! We couldn't download this package: O ne! Nismo mogli preuzeti ovaj paket.Možda da provjerite jeste li još povezani?
hr.Oh no! We couldn't unpack this package a: Oh no! We couldn't unpack this package after downloading it. Maybe try again?
hr.There's been an error, and it's of the d: There's been an error, and it's of the dubious sort.
This game has no playable builds yet.
hr.This game used to have playable builds b: This game used to have playable builds but they have been removed.
hr.This package can not be installed on you: This package can not be installed on your system, but can be quick played in the client.
This package can not be installed on your system.
hr.We are having trouble connecting to Game: Imamo poteškoća u spajanju na Game Jolt.
You are currently running this package. Some options have been disabled while it's open.
hr.You found a secret! But upon further ins: Našli ste tajnu!Ali,daljnim istraživanjem,shvatili ste da je to samo prazna stranica.
hr.Completely free with no option to pay at: Potpuno besplatno bez ikakve opcije plaćanja.
Primaj e-mailove kada netko kupi vaše igre.
